message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $9,500?

Bob, I understand you have a budget, and I'm willing to work with you. How about $10,500? That's still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above $10,000, so how about $9,800? I'm getting closer to my target, and I think we can meet in the middle
